attributes.action: conduct an independent and impartial investigation - NHS medical negligence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I worked for NHS  as a Trainee ( Overseas ) doctor from 1996 onwards. in 1998  i was not well and unfortunately i was  not diagnosed properly and wrongful medication was given. i suffered because of the untoward side effects of the medication. iwas not able to continue my medical training. meanwhile i was also prosecuted. plesae help me to continue my medical training . many thanks and very best wishes...

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
